Reviews.Title: Headset is as good as new
Reviews.Author: Ethann
Reviews.Content: Not much to say about this kit other than it works as advertised.  We have several wireless GN Netcom wireless headsets in our office and one was just not holding a charge any longer.  Since replacing the battery using this kit, the headset is now working as good as new.  The kit was relatively easy to use and the instructions were clear.  I would buy this again when we need to replace another one of our headset batteries.

Reviews.Title: Worked Perfectly
Reviews.Author: David A. Rapperport
Reviews.Content: This product gave me back hours of talk time on my headset.It is easy to install, well worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement
Reviews.Author: P. Jones
Reviews.Content: Had to replace my battery in my GN 9120, and this works great.  Tools included were a great help as well.

Reviews.Title: Steal
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Picked them up while on home leave. Same product in Europe is more than double the price. Prefer original replacement parts on our expenseive head sets so this is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: It is what it says it is.
Reviews.Author: AK Bad Boy
Reviews.Content: This kit for replacing the battery in my Jabra headset is exactly what it purports to be, nothing more and nothing less. The one thing that keeps this from being a full five stars is the fact that the screw drivers were not magnetized. I would have liked it better if the screw drivers were magnetized due to the extremely small size of the screw holding the battery in place. That being said, the kit does come with an extra screw or two in case one gets lost.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jon E. Cox "Cox Dude"
Reviews.Content: We always get this kit for our owner's headsets, they are totally satisfied. They use them everyday, and we do get good life from the battery, sometimes 2 years.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Peter Porter
Reviews.Content: Battery works as expected, my favorite headset (9120) is back to life and working.  Same package I ordered last time I replaced my battery, and that one lasted two years or so.Came packaged as pictured, with jeweler's screwdrivers.  These were not necessary for my headset (maybe for the 9125?), but they're surprisingly decent quality so I've hung on to them.  No need for the tiny torx yet, though.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: BretW
Reviews.Content: My wife's headset was not holding a charge, used this battery and it was easy to replace and works well!

Reviews.Title: Nice easy fix for a dead battery.
Reviews.Author: G. Keller
Reviews.Content: Worked perferctly well, identical fit and finish to the original battery and it worked perfectly from day 1. Screwdrivers make it easy to install.

Reviews.Title: OEM battery kit
Reviews.Author: Bret Pehrson
Reviews.Content: This is a must-have if you have the GN or Jabra headset that uses this battery.  Includes screwdrivers, battery, and screws, instructions -- everything you need to change the battery.  I'm getting about 4 years out of my battery (I consider the battery in need of replacement when it holds enough charge for a 2-hr. call).

Reviews.Title: It Works !
Reviews.Author: J. Smith "scientist"
Reviews.Content: Batteries do not last forever.  This is a simple kit for exchanging the battery on the 9120 headset.  Within 5 minutes of opening the package, I was conversing again on my headset.  I am pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good kit
Reviews.Author: eyez wide open
Reviews.Content: This is a good kit. Got me going again. My GNNetcom 9120 was starting to only give about an hour of talk time before needing juice. It was also flashing charge a lot while sitting on the base. It was the battery. Swapped it out with this kit and all is perfect again. I can talk all day and then some. Headset good as new.Including the screw and torx drivers was a nice touch. My steak knives are thankful for not having to do such an un-steak-knife-like job turning that itty bitty screw.

Reviews.Title: Didn't fix my headset.
Reviews.Author: Walker
Reviews.Content: Maybe I didn't buy the exact right replacement battery, but it didn't fix my Netcom headset and I ended up buying a different one.
